stimulusHtml: Which of the following expressions gives the volume of the solid?

features.html: The region enclosed by the graphs of y = x2 and y = 2x is the base of a solid. For the solid, each cross section perpendicular to the y-axis is a rectangle whose height is 3 times its base in the xy-plane.

choicesHtml: 3 ∫ 0 4 ( y − y 2 ) 2 d y MathType@MTEF@5@5@@46A3@

3 ∫ 0 4 ( y + y 2 ) 2 d y MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4698@

3 ∫ 0 2 ( 2 x − x 2 ) 2 d x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@471E@

3 ∫ 0 2 ( 2 x + x 2 ) 2 d x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4713@
